about.title: About
about.subtitle: A bit about myself
about.content: My name is Henrique Louren√ßo, and I work as a software developer. I reside in Santos, SP, Brazil. With over a year of experience in software development, I've specialized in technologies like React, React Native, and Next.js, following the Kanban methodology for agile project management. Throughout this period, I've honed my skills in crafting optimized and efficient applications. Embracing the 'lifelong learning' lifestyle, I'm always eager to acquire and refine my knowledge.
about.sentence: Living, learning & leveling up one day at a time
